search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for TeamGantt (teamgantt.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for TeamGantt can be found at: [https://www.teamgantt.com/pricing](https://www.teamgantt.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: TeamGantt Pricing: Pro & Unlimited Everything Plans

extracted_content.content:
TeamGantt Pricing: Pro & Unlimited Everything Plans
=============== 

New!

Huge Update! TeamGantt 2.0 Live Event at 1pm ET Today

[Learn more](https://www.teamgantt.com/fall-release-2024)[](https://www.teamgantt.com/pricing#)

[![Image 23](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7711eb780b1a9e4b52ff1/6509cc8127c52d9c28ea5608_TG-Logo-Color.webp)](https://www.teamgantt.com/)

Product

Why TeamGantt?

[Features](https://www.teamgantt.com/features)[Integrations](https://www.teamgantt.com/integrations)[Project Templates](https://www.teamgantt.com/project-templates)[AI Project Plan Generator](https://www.teamgantt.com/ai-project-plan-generator)[Success Stories](https://www.teamgantt.com/success-stories)[100+ Rave Reviews](https://www.teamgantt.com/rave-reviews)

For Teams

[Digital Agencies Run and collaborate on creative projects more smoothly.](https://www.teamgantt.com/uses/agencies)[Marketing Plan, manage, and track product launches and campaigns.](https://www.teamgantt.com/uses/project-management-software-for-marketing-teams)[Construction Stay organized and communicate critical details to teams.](https://www.teamgantt.com/uses/construction-planning-software)[Manufacturing Steamline and scale manufacturing operations.](https://www.teamgantt.com/uses/manufacturing-project-management-software)

See how TeamGantt works

Watch how TeamGantt helps teams like yours meet deadlines and streamlines communication.

[Pricing](https://www.teamgantt.com/pricing)

Features

platform

[All Features](https://www.teamgantt.com/features)[Product Updates](https://www.teamgantt.com/product-releases)

capabilities

[Project Planning](https://www.teamgantt.com/features/project-planning)[Project Management](https://www.teamgantt.com/features/project-management)[Resource Management](https://www.teamgantt.com/features/resource-management)[Team Collaboration](https://www.teamgantt.com/features/team-collaboration)[Stakeholder Communication](https://www.teamgantt.com/features/stakeholder-communication)

[![Image 24](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7711eb780b1a9e4b52ff1/67c8a8b0d3d03da170d81823_67c7839173224a837d3e9053_Ollie_Cooper_Maddox_Planning.webp) Case Study: Maddox Planning TeamGantt helps Maddox Planning work smarter—cutting admin time by 10-20%—with the visibility needed to stay on schedule.](https://www.teamgantt.com/customers/maddox-planning)

Learn

Learn Project Management

[Classes](https://www.teamgantt.com/classes)[Guides](https://www.teamgantt.com/guides)[Blog](https://www.teamgantt.com/blog)[Help Docs](https://support.teamgantt.com/)[Video Tutorials](https://support.teamgantt.com/videos)

Templates

[Marketing Templates Successful marketing projects start with a plan.](https://www.teamgantt.com/project-templates/marketing-templates)[Construction Templates Schedule and track construction jobs.](https://www.teamgantt.com/project-templates/construction-templates)[Software Development Scope out roadmaps and manage backlogs.](https://www.teamgantt.com/project-templates/software-development-templates)[Design Templates Manage design, messaging, and video work.](https://www.teamgantt.com/project-templates/design-and-creative-templates)

[Get our free guide! Learn all about gantt charts and how to use them to manage projects more easily.](https://www.teamgantt.com/what-is-a-gantt-chart)[100+ reasons people love TeamGantt Hear real testimonials from real TeamGantt customers.](https://www.teamgantt.com/rave-reviews)

[Try Free](https://www.teamgantt.com/signup)[Log In](https://app.teamgantt.com/)

[Log In](https://app.teamgantt.com/)[Try Free](https://www.teamgantt.com/signup)

Pay only for managers. Everyone else is free.
=============================================

Only pay for the users who plan and manage projects. The rest of the team can manage their tasks and collaborate for free!

[Free plan](https://www.teamgantt.com/pricing#Free-Plan) also available for personal projects.

Yearly Save 20%

Monthly

Pro
---

$49/mo. per manager

20 projects per manager

![Image 25](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64f7711eb780b1a9e4b52ff1/65a54af8133784500e065492_Info-Icon-White.webp)

Unlimited tasks

Unlimited collaborators

The total number of projects is cumulative. Managers are flexible and can be invited to participate in any project. For instance, a plan involving 2 managers could result in a total of 40 projects.  

[Try Pro](https://www.teamgantt.com/signup)

Try free for 14 days. Cancel anytime.

Free plan also available
------------------------

**One manager** (plus 2 collaborators), **1 project**, **60 tasks**.  
It’s great for students and small projects. [Try free plan](https://www.teamgantt.com/signup?plan=free).

Managers vs.  
free collaborators
---------------------------------

A manager is anyone who needs to **create** and **schedule tasks**, while free users can **update** and **collaborate** on tasks.

[Get started—It's free](https://www.teamgantt.com/signup)

Managers

Collaborators

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

### Can I export my data?

Yes, you can export any chart in both CSV and PDF formats for your records.

### Do I have to sign a long-term contract?

No. You can choose the plan that’s best for you. You can do either a monthly plan or a yearly subscription. The yearly subscription is recommended for simplified billing and a nice discount.

### Do I have to download anything?

No. TeamGantt is a completely web-based gantt chart application. You can simply create your account and get started without any complicated software installs.

### Which payment methods do you accept?

We accept major credit cards—including Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express—as well as PayPal. We process payments through our secure PCI Compliant processing system. Paying by check with an invoice is available on our Enterprise plans. Contact us for more details on Enterprise pricing.

### Can I pay yearly?

Yes. If you pay by credit card for a yearly plan, you can simplify your billing and save over 15%.

### Is there an option to pay by check?

Yes, if you are subscribing for 50 users or more, we can work out arrangements for paying by check if that is easier for your organization.

### Do you have a plan for educational use?

Yes, we actually have free plans for professors using TeamGantt to teach project management in the classroom. [Contact us](https://www.teamgantt.com/contact-us) from your .edu account, and we’ll get you set up!
